Role: Hydro-geologist
Team Size: 3
and Geotechnical expert
The  entailed the mapping of groundwater so as to advice on the Borehole
drilling to serve the community. The  also entailed dam Investigation,
where a trial pit was dug at the reservoir to ascertain the type of soil and its
characteristics to retain water. Vertical electrical soundings were also executed
at the dam axis or the dam embankment to determine the type and the strength of
rocks to withstand the force of water and its weight.
Role: Geotechnical expert
Team Size: 3
The  entailed the mapping of the subsurface so as to advice on the best
intake tank site location in reference to the basement rock type. The  also
entailed treatment tank site investigation, where a trial pit was dug to ascertain
the type of soil and its characteristics to control waste Seepage. Vertical
electrical soundings were also executed to determine the type and the strength of
rocks. A trial pit was also dug at some other point for a tank site investigation.
Later the soil samples were send to the laboratory for analysis and to determine
their atterberg limits.
